about_the_game:
Bruno likes to keep a low profile, Hollywood style. Dressed to impress at the 19th hole, he tees those zees for the hole-in-one - “FORE!”

Customize your slayer with our premium character pack, which includes a unique costume and weapon from the HELL-A Catwalk Collection.

Venice Vogue Bruno includes:
- Downtown Dandy skin for Bruno
- Skull Driver - this weapon can be used by any of the 6 slayers

content_descriptors.notes: Dead Island 2: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Intense Violence or Gore, Suggestive Themes, Strong Language, Use of Drugs, General Mature Content.
